objects.text: 925 Sterling Silver Pink Drop Wreath Studs
Premium Jewelry | Gift for Her | 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and elegant jewelry promotion set against a warm, radial pastel pink background with subtle circular and gradient patterns for depth. At the top center, a bold heading (`heading`) announces the product line with a strong serif font in a rich burgundy tone. Just below it, a refined subheading (`subheading`) describes the item in a stylish serif font. A central image (`product_image`) showcases the jewelry with high clarity, positioned within concentric circular accents. Below the image, a tagline (`tagline`) emphasizes product quality, followed by prominently styled pricing (`price`) in larger font size. A rounded rectangular button (`cta_button`) with a contrasting call-to-action label (`cta`) in white offers clear user engagement.

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Peach: `#FFDCD7`
- Blush Pink: `#F9D0CB`
- Rose Gold: `#E5989B`
- Muted Maroon: `#783D38`
- Deep Rose: `#BB545C`
- Soft Copper: `#E7A190`
- Off-white: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of earrings with a refined and feminine color palette. Predominantly, soft rose gold (#F4A7A0) forms the framework, offering a luxurious and warm undertone. The blush pink enamel (#FAD1D8) on the petal shapes adds a delicate, romantic touch. Crystal-clear white stones (#FFFFFF) and light silver reflections (#DADADA) accent the earrings, highlighting their sparkle and elegance. These colors are flawlessly blended through contrast — the smooth pink tones enhance the brilliance of the crystals, making each element pop. For an advertisement banner, this palette conveys elegance, romance, and sophistication—perfect for luxury or festive campaigns.
